title: Customer Liability for Chipped Card (EMV) Fraud
subtitle: The introduction of the EMV "chip card" has led to misinformation that swiping chipped credit or debit cards leaves consumers liable for fraud.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: If you swipe a chipped card debit/credit at a point-of-sale terminal instead of inserting it into the reader, you become liable for any fraudulent transactions.
